info.name: US Airways Z-Index Fix
info.description:
Fixes z-index problem in www.usairways.com, which prevents users to access anything in the website.

Based on fix for www.vivo.com.br from:

http://www.guiadohardware.net/comunidade/firefox-mostra/817558/

also included in style "Loja Virtual Vivo - Fix para botões inacessíveis"
